meanings.definition: hamperers: those who hinder or obstruct progress
meanings.sent1: The hamperers in the group constantly delayed our project.
meanings.sent2: The hamperers at the meeting made it difficult to reach a decision.
meanings.sent3: The hamperers in the office played pranks that slowed down work.
meanings.sent4: The hamperers were like heavy weights tied to our ankles, dragging us back.
meanings.sent5: The hamperers were like roadblocks on the path to success.

meanings.definition: hamperers: things that impede or slow down a process
meanings.sent1: The heavy traffic was a major hamperer to our journey.
meanings.sent2: The technical issues with the software were hamperers to our productivity.
meanings.sent3: The rainy weather acted as a hamperer to our outdoor plans.
meanings.sent4: The lack of resources became a hamperer to our project's progress.
meanings.sent5: The tangled wires were hamperers to setting up the new equipment.
